ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Misroute Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Misroute') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK(NS_CorrectiveAction__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ErrorLocation__c) , ISBLANK(NS_OperationsManagementContact__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ReasonForError__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Corrective Action, Date Customer Notified, Error Location, Operations Management Contact and Reason for Error prior to closing the Case.
